channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Huge open manhole cover 4 foot deep, 11th September
item.description:
Huge hazard on Chester green right behind the temporary bus stop where many children wait on the grass after school now has a huge manhole opened just waiting for somebody to fall into it

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cone outside house to prevent others from parking, 11th September
item.description:
The owners of 109 Kingsway have a cone outside their house permanently, located significantly into the road, in order to stop others from parking there. This is a public road and the owners of this house should not be able to reserve this space for themselves. In addition, the cone is more often than not situated well into the road, sometimes up to a metre, which narrows the road, particularly if there is a car parked opposite, which there often is. This causes a hazard for traffic coming down the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingsway, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet
